Data.ShortDescription: Universal AI chat application with Liquid Glass design
Data.Description: Docan is a universal AI chat application featuring a stunning Liquid Glass design. Connect with various AI providers and enjoy a seamless chat experience across all your devices.

DefaultLocale.ShortDescription: Universal AI chat application with Liquid Glass design
DefaultLocale.Description: Docan is a universal AI chat application featuring a stunning Liquid Glass design. Connect with various AI providers and enjoy a seamless chat experience across all your devices.

Data.Description: Break free from corporate streaming platforms. Doudou connects to your self-hosted music services like Jellyfin, Plex, and Navidrome, giving you complete control over your music library.

DefaultLocale.Description: Break free from corporate streaming platforms. Doudou connects to your self-hosted music services like Jellyfin, Plex, and Navidrome, giving you complete control over your music library.

Data.Description: A beautiful, modern multi-platform Jellyfin client built with Flutter. Features native video playback powered by media_kit, glassmorphism design with blur effects and glass-like components, dark mode, offline support with Hive, and adaptive UI optimized for desktop, mobile, and TV.

DefaultLocale.Description: A beautiful, modern multi-platform Jellyfin client built with Flutter. Features native video playback powered by media_kit, glassmorphism design with blur effects and glass-like components, dark mode, offline support with Hive, and adaptive UI optimized for desktop, mobile, and TV.

Data.Description: The successor to BaoBao. A modern, privacy-focused client for the e621 community. Built with user experience and data protection as top priorities.

DefaultLocale.Description: The successor to BaoBao. A modern, privacy-focused client for the e621 community. Built with user experience and data protection as top priorities.

Data.Description: Manage your torrents with Opentorrent, a cross-platform qBittorrent client that brings seamless torrenting to iOS, macOS, Windows, Linux, Android, and the Web.

DefaultLocale.Description: Manage your torrents with Opentorrent, a cross-platform qBittorrent client that brings seamless torrenting to iOS, macOS, Windows, Linux, Android, and the Web.
